website_summaries.verdict: The Urbanears Active Hellas are a rare example of workout-friendly, machine-washable on-ear Bluetooth headphones.
pros: Comfortable design with machine-washable earpads and headband padding
cons: Sound can use more focus on the highs

customer_reviews.title: ... first time I played music through these I was like, arrrghhh the treble is terrible
customer_reviews.text: The first time I played music through these I was like, arrrghhh the treble is terrible! But rather than immediately asking for a refund I turned the treble down on my phone and turned the bass up a bit, now they sound pretty reasonable. It is a shame that I have to mess with my equalizer so much to get them sounding decent, and when all is said and done they only sound decent, they don't sound great. But I love the fact that these are bluetooth, lightweight and have washable inserts, as I use them in the gym. They are also fairly cheap, so I'll be keeping them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Farnell

customer_reviews.title: Love the touch sensitive panel for controls
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Honestly for the price and the fact that these are Bluetooth, the quality of sound is tremendous and hands down beat the previous pair of Monster isport earphones I had. I have charged once since buying them and they're still going 3 weeks later. Really impressed and would def buy again. Love the touch sensitive panel for controls. Don't hesitate, just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. K. J. Rebeiro

customer_reviews.title: They do the job, but the piece that goe's ...
customer_reviews.text: They do the job, but the piece that goe's over the head keeps coming away from the frame. The controls are on the right side of the ear piece that dont light up.
customer_reviews.author: Helius

customer_reviews.title: Best headphones for working out
customer_reviews.text: Excellent light headphones, good battery duration and tight enough so don’t fall off !
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Love these headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for the gym! Controls work well once you are used to the slight delay. Good range, comfy to wear. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tiggy

customer_reviews.title: Great cans brilliant sound from over ear phones very light ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cans brilliant sound from over ear phones very light if you walk and take them off for a bit or in a backpack. Ive washed my earcups and headband daily for a month now and are still in pristine condition! Just another great from Sweden so that's 2 now ABBA and Urbanears :) 10/10
customer_reviews.author: G Lawther

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: Extremley poor quality headphones! Placed ear pads in the wash and now they do not fit ear cups. Even before washing, issues with headband going off. Had to miss gym/runs as I didnt have any music. Very disappointed and throwing in the bin.
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: At first it worked fine and connected to my iPhone 6. But now my iPhone or any other smartphone, can't f
customer_reviews.author: Hadar

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running
customer_reviews.text: My GF bought me these(at my request) for my birthday as my wired headphones were driving me nuts out running.I read the entire internet and these seemed to be everything I was after.And they are. They sound great,are sweatproof and are super comfy,well after a day or two they were,due to the nature of the sweatproof,washable cushions. Long story short..if like me you don't like earbuds..these are just the job. The only way they could be better would be if they were rainproof as well! Maybe Hellas 2.0 will be,eh Urbanears?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: faulty bluetooth terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: These stopped showing up on any list of devices, and sadly the customer services were terrible and mess you around etc. After 2 months of emailing I've made no progress. The faulty product is still sitting on my desk. They were good for the month they worked but seriously avoid these. This company is only ok for budget headphones look elsewhere if you want something good...
customer_reviews.author: Freddie

product_meta.title: Urbanears - Hellas Wireless Bluetooth Headphones - Black Belt
product_meta.description:
Colour Name:Black Belt

The Sweat-Friendly Headphone
Cord-free Hellas stay in place and out of the way whether you're running laps or doing an upside-down crunch.

Cord-Free Listening
Move about freely. These headphones are wireless and Bluetooth-ready with up to 14 solid hours of playtime on a single charge.

Swipe Interface
The built-in swipe interface lets you cycle through your playlist and pick up calls with a simple swipe and tap of the ear cup.

Washable Parts
Keep your headphones fresh and clean, even when your music is not. Remove the headband and ear cushions and toss them in the wash.

BOX CONTAINS
1 x Hellas Headphones
feature_bullets: Up to 14 solid hours of playtime on a single charge
Removable and washable headband and ear cushions
Built-in swipe interface to control playlist and pick up calls
Wireless bluetooth headphones with Built-in microphone
